Got it! Don\'t show this again

Thanks for downloading the Colorado Peak Id app!

As with all augmented reality apps, this app is only as good as the GPS, compass, and gyrometers on your phone, so how well this works depends on what hardware you have and how it is calibrated. For much more information, please view the help screen.

Additionally, you should know that this is free software available under the GNU Public License, the terms of which can be seen by clicking the "License" button below or accessed via the menu. The source code is available at http://www.github.com/nathanhale/COPeakId
